original_title: 医学博士、レイプの記録 豹変 西野翔
overview: Nishino, a doctor of medicine who is developing a silver bullet for an unexplained disease. Meanwhile, Sasaki, a development member, gets infected. He himself becomes a laboratory table without waiting for the national clinical approval, and tries to illuminate the effectiveness of the drug.
title: Medical Doctor's Rape Record – Sho Nishino's Sudden Change
